title: Coralogix and OpenTelemetry on Checkly: Optimizing Latency
author: Jan Grzesik
description: Discover how OpenTelemetry tracing and Coralogix analysis resolve latency issues, proving observability's role in enhancing system performance and reliability.
cntitle: Coralogix 和 OpenTelemetry 在 Checkly 上：优化延迟
cndescription: 了解 OpenTelemetry 追踪和 Coralogix 分析如何解决延迟问题，证明可观察性在提高系统性能和可靠性方面的作用。
